website_summaries.verdict: These patterned beach towels are as absorbent as they are elegant.
pros: Comes with your choice of patterns in a stylish waterproof carry bag
Works as a cooling wrap, towel, or blanket
cons: Lightweight for convenient carrying, but be prepared to weight it down in case of a breeze

customer_reviews.title: Amazing beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this towel!!! Very big yet super compact and comes in a great zipper carry bag. It is very easy to fit the towel back in the bag too. Dries very quickly and absorbs the water from your hair and bathing suit in no time. My 3 daughters who all have long hair were all able to use it to towel dry their hair much faster than using their regular beach towels. They all asked me to buy more so they could have their own. After using this towel, I definitely will be!
customer_reviews.author: Michele D.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: We were going to Thailand for 3 weeks and could only take 15 Lbs per person. I have used traditional towels (get stinky in humid climates), sarongs (dry quickly but not absorbent), and heavy duty travel towels from the outdoors store (held all the sand and debris!). This will be the last travel towel I buy. At first I thought the xl was a little long, but it was actually perfect. Since it was bigger I could use it as a blanket at the airport when our flight was delayed, or put it down to lay on at the beach. Sand never stuck to it, and it dried really quickly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent towel to take on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased I purchased this towel to take to Mexico on vacation. I purchased one for each family member. All four fit in one backpack with LOTS of room to spare. I was worried they would not dry you off because they are so lightweight, but they do. They dry quickly and you can brush the sand right off them, it doesn't stick at all. They worked well on the beach and as a blanket on the plane on the way home. I recommend them to everyone and will be giving them as Christmas presents this year!
customer_reviews.author: J. Linke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These towels are super lightweight and come in carrying case that makes it easy to throw in your beach bag or suitcase and go! It’s not a terry cloth towel so it might not be for you if you think you need something soft and fluffy. This is a microfiber material and you just pat yourself dry. It was also a perfect length to put on a beach chair. I bought three and will be getting more for our summer visitors to use at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Beach Towels
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for an upcoming trip to Hawaii and absolutely love them. Our friends bought different ones from another company and they were the same price but ours are MUCH softer and MUCH bigger. We love the handy pouch to keep the beach bag organized and they washed up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: Snap Broken
customer_reviews.text: The two different towels came in the exact color I ordered and did not have any bad odor. The only reason I gave them three stars is because the side snap would not snap to stay closed. I ordered these towels to utilize them on a beach. As you know, it is very breezy at the beach and these towels are very light weight so I need to snap to function properly to snap the chair so I won't lose my towel. I have put in for an exchange and crossing my fingers the new ones work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, large, light weight towel that is really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this microfiber towel! I was looking for something thin, lightweight, so it won't take up too much space in the suitcase. When I travel, I plan to use these for primary bath towels, and I wanted something large enough to wrap up in and be able to walk out of the bathroom and still be covered. The texture is soft, it dries fast, and I did not find anyone the same so it is unique design. I did not want the snap loop in the corner and this one is in the middle. Just perfect for hanging on the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Chin Fen Lai

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised and marketed as a beach TOWEL.... it's a sheet,. Thin non water absorbent sheet.. No way no how even remotely resembling a beach towel. Completely falsely advertised
customer_reviews.author: K. Oshea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing (when its not windy...)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel towel and the blue flower is really beautiful. Its comfortable on sand and packs fantastically. The issue I had where I went is that it was very windy and its so light and large (that is really a pro) that it could be a bit hard to manage where there weren't rocks and lots of things to weigh it down. Dries fast, really great. No regrets. Will carry it with me on other trips -- I liked it better than using a sarong, which I have done also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regret it at all!
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. It is soft, super-absorbent and fast drying. The quality is very good. It is a bit thinner than an average towel. I was told that Microfiber absorbs almost 5 times more. That's why it dries off so fast. I enjoy using it not only going to beach, ocean and pool. It is a gorgeous bath towel or beach blanket ! My family and I use it for park picnics, yoga, meditation and poolside lounging.
customer_reviews.author: Spirituality

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bright color and it is perfect for beach or traveling. The design was as pictured and was easily recognizable from afar on the beach and at the pool. Definitely would recommend this towel to anyone who is looking to replace their beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not At All What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a thin somewhat cottony towel similar to microfiber cleaning towels. This material is extremely thin and silky/suede like. It feels like it should not get wet or if it was used for drying yourself off it would be useless. It feels too flimsy to use to lay out on sand. I thought about keeping it and just using it as a backdrop or decor but the print is poor and does not resemble the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Angel Light

customer_reviews.title: Color bleeds badly, even after pre-washing
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited for this product, and it appeared to work well at first blush. It was lightweight, absorbent, and easy to pack away. The bad? It stained the seats of my brand new boat. Yes, I did pre-wash...just the two towels I bought alone, given the advice the company gave on potential bleed if used out of the box. I had assumed that pre-washing would remove the bleed risk. My fault for assuming this product wouldn’t damage other items. Please don’t make the same mistake I made...thankfully it will only be a few hundred dollars to replace the seat cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rettich

customer_reviews.title: Great towel. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great and beautiful towel: Ideal as a yoga towel, for the gym or swimming pool bag and, especially, for traveling. In my pool bag, this towel takes up almost no space and adds a fraction of the weight of my regular towels. The feel is like the softest chamois and it may take a little getting used to. I like to pat myself dry, as opposed to scrubbing with it. The towel I was sent is a very useful size for yoga, as a drying towel and to sit on at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Towel
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love the size!!! It’s great to pack n take on vacation because it doesn’t tkaes up hardly any room!!! It’s also great to,take tomwater aerobics to the YMCA! The is the best lightweight absorbent towel I’ve ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very compact!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel! This oversized towel is compact and takes up very little room in a bag. Dries quickly. Great to use for Yoga as well. I’ll be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for sand but extremely thin
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my towel it served my purpose. I went on a sailing trip and didn't want to track a ton of sand back to the boat. The towel does retain a small amount of sand but nothing that would bother you. It shakes out wonderfully. The flip side to that is that it's extremely thin and you can feel everything under you. I was able to use it on the beach and not be uncomfortable but I wasn't able to lay out on the boat deck with it. It was just too thin. It travels well and rolls right up in it's own bag which was perfect because I only take carry ons. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: I just receive this item and while i haven't had a chance to test durability or absorbancy the only reason I've decided against sending it back just yet is just how beautidul the colors are, the length/width. It covers my lounge chair perfectly (pic includef for reference)! It is not heavy but i would not want to use this on my skin AT ALL. I would only use as a buffer against the elements. Will do a test then decide.
customer_reviews.author: Twinz_J.

customer_reviews.title: The greatest beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast! The design matched the picture exactly. It is lightweight and works just like they said. It works perfectly as a cooling wrap. It's also great on the sand as a blanket. The sand shakes out very easily. I am delighted with my towel. I can't wait to order more! It even comes in its own bag!
customer_reviews.author: rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a compact lightweight towel for hiking and this was perfect. Used it hiking all over Arizona anytime I knew we would be swimming and it was exactly what I needed. Its so compact and fit nicely in my backpack without taking up much space and it works very well and dries easily upon use. Definitely recommend if you are going to do long hikes but need to bring a towel. I didnt want a bulky heavy thing to lug around and this fits the bill and then some. plus the patterns are all super cute and vibrant and i love the little carrying pouch it comes with. makes it even easier to keep stored and compact for travels.
customer_reviews.author: khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and nice
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a large towel for my beach trip when I found this one. The color and design is what caught my attention in the first place. After reading others' review and compare the price with other sellers, I decide to go with it. The shipping is fast, got the towel in no time. First thing I did is washing them, just to test it out. After washing and drying, the towel still looks like new without color fading. Pack it in my sling bag without any hitch despite its large size. So glad I don't have to carry a duffel bag just for one gigantic towel. Definitely a good product worth to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Must have on long trips & with limited space. I took this on a month-long international trip and it came in handy at the beach. It absorbed well. It folded so small that it fits into a tiny little bag, which took up very little space. The towel was lightweight and I was able to carry it around my wrist. I washed it in a sink with tide detergent and let it dry overnight & it smelled fine. The only thing I would change is not buying about 4 of these, so I would have a few to use as bath towels.
customer_reviews.author: FK

customer_reviews.title: Very Different Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beach blanket because it is different. The material is very soft and fluid. It is large and compacts down to the perfect size for travel and comes with it's own mesh bag for travelling. I used this towel for my trip to Myrtle Beach and it was perfect. It was absorbent and the sand just shook off of it. It was big enough to lie down on and not worry about your feet sticking in the sand. It also laundered well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DebRom

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lightweight, compact towel for a catamaran trip that required minimal packing. Lots of options, but chose this one for the cute design and the little zip bag it came in. I bought the XL and was glad I did, great size for beach chairs and even to use as a wrap. I did not find it to be quick dry, it did absorb the water but definitely does not dry quickly, needed an overnight in a breeze. However, even wet it takes up less space than a terry towel in a beach bag. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: globetreker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beach Trip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace bulky beach towels since we were planning on driving to several beaches during our trip to Hawaii. This is very absorbent, lightweight, washes well, and dries very quickly. Since the fabric is very tight knit, one it's dry, sand and dirt shake right off.
customer_reviews.author: World travels

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color is not bright and vibrant like the photos! It’s very muted and that is why I’m giving this 3 stars. I don’t like when company’s enhance photos so it “shows” better but you end up with a different product. I was looking forward to vibrant colors on the beach. Not sure if I’m gonna keep it...
customer_reviews.author: Misha Earth

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I had hard time choosing which towel as all have beautiful designs. Lots of colors to choose from and I bought a few already. The towel is truly good size (78x35) for the price. I love to travel with it because it's so convenient, light weight, super absorbent, and it dries fast. It rolls up to a tiny size and I like it to be with me everywhere. I think these towels will be a good gift for my family, so I m planing to buy few more of those unique and amazing designs. I never new about about these towels before but now I am glad I chose to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Buy this towel- you won't regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I expected- thought it would have the low pile terry type cloth. But-- it is amazingly absorbable, huge- wraps around you twice- dries you off and then dries itself so very fast- amazing. I used it on a beach trip, and then it went on a 2 week RV trip and was the best towel they had- no odors. The colors are so bright and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was not my idea of a towel
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with this "Towel" but I was looking for a fluffy towel. This is a flat rug like thing and will probably work well on the beach but not for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morning

customer_reviews.title: One of My Best Purchases of the Year
customer_reviews.text: We love these towels! I have now bought five of these, for myself and others. We took them on Florida beach trip and numerous camp trips. They are great for toweling off but also work great for light blanket. Most sand and ground dirt shakes right off and they dry quickly. I have washed in machine and line dried a number of times and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This towel is amazingly absorbent and soft! They make a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I went on a 17 day vacation in which I took this towel in my suitcase with the intent of having it just in case. When I did have the need to use it it was super absorbent for my long hair and for my body to dry off. The towel itself also dried very quickly so I was able to use it again. I liked it so well I intend to by many more , they travel very well in a zippered pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's crap
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. The advertising makes it seem like you are going to get a large towel...you aren't. It's a pretty standard size, but the measurements are true to what is listed so it is my fault for believingthe advertising and not checking the measurements. What's worse is the material SUCKS. It feels less like towel and more like a flag. The design is pretty which is why I gave 2 stars instead of 1, but the color is way less vibrant than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: noahs

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is not a towel or even a blanket. It feels like a thin piece of cloth. If you just want something cute to sit on at the beach this may work but it wasn’t at all what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Dupee

customer_reviews.title: I love these towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first microfiber towel in August of 2018 to take it with me to a month-long trip to Spain. It worked perfectly. I was not sure about the color, but it turned out to be good, and it has not faded out. I have recently bought 2 more and I am going to buy even more to present them to my relatives and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Compact
customer_reviews.text: This towel was better than I expected. It is very soft and thin. It's not like the terry cloth microfiber - which I do not like the feel of. Even though it is thin it's very absorbent and dries quickly. My daughter is going on a cruise this summer and it will be perfect for her to pack for stops at the beach or for the pool. she could even take 2.
customer_reviews.author: Randie5

customer_reviews.title: Sand Free, lightweight and stylish towel
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this large towel and the convenient stylish bag it comes in. It is totally sand free, lightweight and can be carried even in your purse. Perfect beach towel size and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: claribel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: This towel is perfect for the beach or the pool. I try to keep things simple and easy when heading the beach and this towel fits easily into a backpack. The towel also performs well and dries fast (do more heavy damp beach towels)
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL GARIEPY

customer_reviews.title: Large and light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of lugging a large beach towel on vacation or using the small ones usually provided at resorts or on ships. The fabric is light, the colors are vibrant and the weight is much lighter than a typical terry cloth towel. I look forward to using it on my upcoming trip to Costa Rica.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best Towel
customer_reviews.text: This was a great beach towel when i went on vacation. I was worried since it is very thin but it was actually better than having a regular beach towel. It dried super fast and is very light weight. I loved that i could just fold it up into a tiny square and go.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best beach towel ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are the best I have ever used!! Moving to the beach I needed great beach towels and let me tell you these are fabulous. When I had friends come to visit everyone was fighting over these towels so I ordered more!! Love these!! ❤️❤️ They are lightweight, wash easy, and fold up for easy carrying. You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Softness, Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 towels, 1 for my sister and 1 for myself. I loved how these towels work, nice & soft, very absorbent and the sand shakes out very easily... They are very large and fold up to nothing. The bag they come in is very convenient for packing and carrying anywhere. My sister was very happy about this purchase. We just back from Cabo and we used the towels a lot. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carol Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: the color r dull.. i was so ercited to open ot n got disappointed when o saw the colors.. they look dull compared to the picture.. wish the color r vibrant..
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many Amazon reviews. Usually a product is just what you expect - this towel is way more than I expected. The colors are beautiful, even after a wash. It is so absorbent that you are almost totally dry (even your swimsuit!) after using it. I am buying one for every family member as a holiday gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, multiple uses, must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! Sand wont stic, dries quickly for no mildew in humid places, packs small for carry, light weight, have in backpack now and use for a throw down at the park, fairs, beach, great for covering up out of the sun on walks too! Has been washed multiple times and is in like new condition still!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Weight Towel That Takes Up Practically No Room in Beach Bag.
customer_reviews.text: With all the other items that we need to carry in our beach bag, it's great that we can now easily stick in our new Microfiber Beach Towels, and they add very little additional weight and take up very little room. They are very attractive and dry quickly. The large size is great and easily covers lounge chairs. So glad we found them.
customer_reviews.author: S J D

customer_reviews.title: Great travel towel
customer_reviews.text: This towel was great for our cruise. Yes, the cruise line supplies towels, but I liked having one that was different. It packs up so small that it is easy to pack. It was perfect for day trips to the beaches. It is not thick like a regular towel, but it dries quickly, doesn't collect sand and packs up into a very small space.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, soft and dries fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my recent tropical vacation. Great travel towel! The towel is soft, lightweight and dries super fast. Love the little snap on the side of the towel to attach to your beach chair so it doesn't blow away. Only Improvement would be to have snaps on each side!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: travels well
customer_reviews.text: my travel towel packs nicely it doesn't take up a lot of space, I have to make sure I have when I leave to come back from vaca because someone is always trying to steal it because they like it so much
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Febonio

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Micro Fiber Towel!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a pool and swim on my breaks, so I use lots of towels. I love that these towels are lightweight, yet SOO absorbent and dry fast. I can carry 2-3 towels easily in my bag. My cotton beach towels take nearly a day to dry - these dry and are ready to go within hours.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: Quality buy
customer_reviews.text: I pack and use the towel for everything! Lightweight and perfect to use for travel. I have washed and dried at least a hundred times and it has held up great! I will be buying more in other colors!!
customer_reviews.author: jesszies21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a 7 day trip aboard a catamaran in the BVI’s. My husband I traveled with our microfiber beach towels and used them everyday. We snorkeled, swam and showered around the boat and rinsed them off. They dried fast and were perfect for our trip. If you don’t own one you best hurry up and get one before the secret gets out as to how wonderful they are.
customer_reviews.author: LMS418

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: The size and softness are wonderful. We also love the carrying cases. Took them to Europe and the Roman Baths there, and they were perfect. Dries quickly so no worries about smelly mildewed towels. One con is the blue color is definitely Purple and the blue binding thread a bright blue color. This is merely aesthetics so not a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Bad item - not a towel
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was not a towel it was more like a satin flag. I am still awaiting refund after three weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!!!

customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful patterns, high quality, folds up compactly for travel. I recently went to Costa Rica, and this towel was perfect for all the activities I did! Sand doesn’t stick, and it air dries pretty quickly. I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My husband paddle surfs, so I ordered this as a little gift for him. He loves it so much. It’s easy to get all the sand off with one good shake, and keeps his car nice and clean after a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBankster

customer_reviews.title: great quality and price

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Towels
customer_reviews.text: These towels are amazing! I bought one for camping. It packs up very small, absorbs water well, and dries super quickly. So much better than big, heavy traditional towels that take forever to dry. I liked the towel so much, I gave them as Christmas gifts. Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: newenglander68

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about these towels but they are absolutely amazing! Take no room in my bag Dry fast Look great

customer_reviews.title: Packs small and works great

customer_reviews.title: Great traditional towel alternative

My teenage daughters love them but teenage son doesn’t care for the feel/thinness of them even though they work great and are very compact for their size.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: It’s light. It’s pretty. It wicks away moisture from your bathing suit so quickly! My bathing suit was almost dry in a relatively short time....very impressed. Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are Perfect for what I was looking for and work better than I thought they would. They are very thin and compact, and the sand doesn’t get caught in them. No more having to carry around a bulky towel bag when we go out. They are large and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: RNPfrog

customer_reviews.title: Recommended beach towel
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it was more absorbent but, I know that’s hard to do without becoming thicker. However, it is a very good towel for shucking the water off and keeping on warmer still. Obviously thinner, so for sure lightweight and makes it easy to travel with. Love the bag it comes in as my baby pool bag.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hajde

customer_reviews.title: Great beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these towels for a beach trip, and they were great. Absorbent and easy to shake off the sand. Plus since they're thin, I could tie it like a sarong around my waist to walk back from the beach.
customer_reviews.author: KF9206

customer_reviews.title: Best beach towel I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This towel is super thin so it takes up a lot less space than a regular beach towel. It’s very absorbent. It’s also a beautiful towel. Love it.

customer_reviews.text: Holds up great, nice size. I like that it has it's own bag and folds up small.

customer_reviews.title: XLarge, yet compact!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 XLarge pretty towels for a trip to Australia! Went to Whitehaven Beach, where the sand is so fine, it's difficult to shake out of a beach towel, but not these! The pouch even has mess so if sand gets in, you can still shake it out. They also dry very quickly. Love these towels and highly recommend!
